name: MolmerSorensenGate
title: Mølmer–Sørensen Entangling Gate
description: Simultaneous blue and red sideband tones on both ions creating an effective XX interaction (maximally entangling for θ=π/2). Detunings are ±δ from the carrier; gate time is t_gate chosen to accumulate the desired entangling phase.
labels: Bichromatic blue & red sidebands (gate time t_gate)
notes: Choose t_gate and δ such that the phonon excitation returns to ground (closed phase space) and the desired entangling phase is acquired.
